content.raw:
tested in vrc 1 and 2:

Some observations:

- vrc 1: it is possible to get a point when the vehicle passes through the gate without atlas in it.

- vrc 1 and 2: To get all points, atlas/vehicle has to go through the gate in order. So if it passes through 1, misses 2nd, then passes 3 and 4, you only get point for the first gate.
content.html:
tested in vrc 1 and 2:

Some observations:

  • vrc 1: it is possible to get a point when the vehicle passes through the gate without atlas in it.

  • vrc 1 and 2: To get all points, atlas/vehicle has to go through the gate in order. So if it passes through 1, misses 2nd, then passes 3 and 4, you only get point for the first gate.
